explains: v. 观光（sightsee 的现在分词形式）
wordGroup: sightseeing bus 观光巴士；游览巴士；旅游客车
sightseeing car 游览客车；观光汽车

sentences.en: Did you have a chance to do any sightseeing ?
sentences.cn: 你有没有出去游览的机会？

sentences.en: Sightseeing is best done either by tour bus or by bicycles.
sentences.cn: 观光最好要么乘游览巴士，要么骑自行车。

sentences.en: A sightseeing tour of the city is included to help you get your bearings.
sentences.cn: 城市观光游包括在内，以帮助你们弄清方向。
